citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee's (IACUC) report to the Institutional Official, dated January 27, 2025,
was not reviewed and signed by a majority of the members. Review and sign off by members ensures accountability for
the contents of the report by the IACUC. The facility must ensure that semi annual reports are reviewed and signed by a
majority of the IACUC.
Correct from this date forward March 04, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee's (IACUC) report to the Institutional Official, dated January 27, 2025, 
was not reviewed and signed by a majority of the members. Review and sign off by members ensures accountability for 
the contents of the report by the IACUC. The facility must ensure that semi annual reports are reviewed and signed by a 
majority of the IACUC. 
 
Correct from this date forward March 04, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
